be_moniest.step3: Show your analysis to the world

payment.title: Pay and Get Payments with Crypto
payment.desc: Binance Pay is a contactless, borderless and secure cryptocurrency payment technology designed by Binance.

questions.answer0: 'Moniest' is a term that represents users or analysts who provide valuable information about the crypto markets, a key component of our platform.
questions.answer1: After registering on our platform, you can become Moniest in a few steps. Then, you're ready to share your insights with users. Since we only make payments through Binance for now, it is mandatory to be a Binance user.
questions.question2: How can I decide whether to subscribe to a Moniest?
questions.answer2: By entering Moniest's profile page, you can access 7-day, 30-Day and Total statistics of ROI, PNL, and Win Rates, as well as previous analysis. This will help you subscribe to Moniest that is most suitable for you.
questions.question3: How do I subscribe to a Moniest?
questions.answer3: From Moniest's profile, determine how many months you will subscribe to it. You can then access their analysis after paying the subscription fee through Binance, to which we will automatically redirect you.
questions.question4: How can I cancel my subscription to Moniest?
questions.answer4: When you want to cancel your subscription, if you have any remaining months, your payment will be transferred back to your Binance account. The subscription does not automatically renew after it expires.

still_question.title: Still have questions?
still_question.header: You can always contact us for your questions and requests

get_binance_id.title: How to Find My User ID (BUID) on Binance.com
get_binance_id.description: Binance ID or UID is a unique identifier allocated to each account. Follow the below steps to find it on the Binance website or App.

on_app.title: On Binance App:
on_app.desc: Tap the [Profile] icon on the top left corner. You will then see your user ID under your email address.

on_website.title: On Binance website:
on_website.desc: Log in to your account and go to [Profile] - [Dashboard]. You'll see your User ID next to your email address at the top of the page.

submit.becoming_moniest: You become moniest. You can now share your analysis with the world.
submit.change_variables: You can change your Binance ID and Subscription Fee at any time in your Account Settings. The total amount you will earn per subscription will be {{value}}$.

be_moniest.folow_steps: You will find all the information you need to get started. Follow our simple steps to become a Moniest.

subs_modal.subs_desc: The total of the months you set will be withdrawn from your account in one go and will be paid monthly to moniest. When you want to cancel, it will be credited back to your account if you have any remaining months. Subscription does not automatically renew after it expires.
subs_modal.unsub_desc: If you wish to cancel your subscription, the remaining amount (if any) will be transferred to your Binance account with your <bold>{{payer_id}}</bold> Payment ID, deducting (<bold>{{fee}}%</bold>) of the transaction fee from your remaining months.

cancel_modal.title: Subscription Cancellation
cancel_modal.message: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
cancel_modal.message_body: If you cancel, you will no longer have access to moniest's live analytics.

Share your thoughts and suggestions with us to make

toast.feedback_sent: Your feedback has been sent successfully

not_advice.message:
We want you to succeed, and that starts with understanding the risks in investment.

Before you start doing investment transactions, it's advised to have the necessary knowledge, not directly apply analyses, conduct your own research, and implement the investment model that suits you best for potential income. Remember that the profits and losses you get based on analyses are entirely your responsibility. We recommend you to manage positions effectively using stop levels.

The content shared on the Moniesto platform doesn't include any investment advice. Moniesto is not responsible for any content shared here. Moniesto don't control or influence the risks in the investment market.

All the information contained in an analysis is shared only to assist investors by Analysts (Moniests). Moniesto is not responsible for that shared information.

maintenance_mode.title: We'll be right back!

help_info.title: Useful Information
help_info.desc: On our platform, PNL and ROI are calculated assuming $1000 is invested in each analysis. You can find the PNL, ROI definition and other useful information below.
help_info.roi_desc: It is the return on investment rate of an analysis. For example, if the ROI is +10%, it means that it provided a return of 10% of the $1000 invested.
help_info.pnl_desc: The profit and loss result of an analysis. For example, if PNL is +100$, it means that the invested $1000 yielded a return of $100.
help_info.max_roi_desc: It is the maximum return on investment that an analysis in 'in progress' status can receive in a successful scenario.
help_info.max_pnl_desc: The maximum amount of profit an analysis with 'in progress' status can receive in a successful scenario
